problem_statement: I can't keep up with everything on the computer and I'm always worried I'll click the wrong thing and break it
solution_summary: Step-by-step guide with big clear buttons that walks me through tasks one at a time so I can't get lost
current_state: Using email and websites/portals for forms with frequent logouts and password issues. Repeating download/fill/save/upload/email workflow where files get lost or saved in wrong places. Tabs and windows are confusing. Avoiding drag-and-drop, right-click menus, settings, spreadsheets, and updates out of fear. Printing and scanning causes stress. Writing steps on sticky notes to remember clicks. Process is slow and nerve-wracking with constant worry about losing work or breaking something.
success_criteria: No need for sticky notes - steps are right there and feel safe to follow
Can always find files without panicky 'where did it go?' feeling
Stop being scared to click things because system won't let me mess up
Feel calm instead of dreading computer tasks - 'okay, I can do this'

include: Printing and scanning (if it can stay simple)
exclude: Changing how email or other programs look

constraints: Must work on current computer and browser - no switching to new tools
Must be ready to use without setup every time
Cost must be very small if any
deal_breakers: Requiring installation of lots of software or complicated setup
Changing how email or screen looks in confusing ways
Requiring learning lots of new steps to get to the simple steps
Anything that feels heavier or scarier than current workflow

users_stakeholders.description: Person struggling with computer tasks who needs simple, guided workflow
Nephew and office IT person who currently help when things go wrong
People who send forms and receive completed files back - would benefit from more reliable submissions
Boss who would need to approve if this became official work tool

timeline: As soon as possible - daily frustration with current workflow causes waste of time and anxiety
dependencies: None - can work with current setup without waiting for updates or approvals
business_metrics: Reduced calls to nephew/IT for help
Elimination of lost or misplaced files
Time reduction from 30 minutes to just minutes for file workflow
Emotional state change from nervous/anxious to calm when doing computer tasks
